alert.note: Alert for Accomack; Northampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 8:51AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT ACCOMACK AND NORTHERN NORTHAMPTON COUNTIES... At 849 AM EST, snow showers were located near and to the west of Melfa, moving east southeast at 25 mph. Visibilities will quickly drop to less than one mile in the heavier snow showers. In addition, snow may coat the ground and cause slippery conditions on area roadways with temperatures below freezing. Locations impacted include... Exmore, Onancock, Parksley, Onley, Nassawadox, Willis Wharf, Accomac, Melfa, Bloxom, Wachapreague, Painter, Keller, Harborton, Mappsville, Franktown, Wallops Island, Nelsonia, Modest Town, Clam and Guilford. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
